[BorgBase](https://www.borgbase.com/) started out to make remote backups with [Borg](https://borgbackup.readthedocs.io/en/stable/) simple and secure. Since then we ran a large beta-program here on [LET](https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/152595/beta-testers-for-hosted-borg-backup-services-wanted-100gb-free-space/p1) and launched an [open source backup client for desktops](https://github.com/borgbase/vorta).

**Main features:**
- Everything encrypted, only you control the key
- Append-Only mode prevents any changes to existing backups
- Minimal upload and space usage, everything is compressed and deduplicated client-side
- Monitoring: get notified of broken or missing backups
- [API](https://github.com/borgbase/borgbase-api-client) to #AutomateAllTheThings
- Full [details](https://www.borgbase.com/) and [docs](https://docs.borgbase.com/)

![](https://www.borgbase.com/static/screenshots/repos-5.jpg)

**Upcoming features:**
We love feedback and regularly add new features. If you are missing a feature, suggest it [here](https://borgbase.fider.io/?view=most-wanted). Some exciting features are already in the pipeline. Like multi-factor authentication using WebAuthn/U2F (in addition to existing 2FA) and better logging of all repo events.

**Pricing:** (before discount)
- Small plan, $25/year: 100GB and 10 repos, $.01/GB/month thereafter.
- Large plan, $15/month or $150/year: 2TB and unlimited repos, $.005/GB/month thereafter
- Custom plans or private deployments: [get in touch](mailto:hello@borgbase.com)

To say "Thank You" for the support and feedback LET has provided, we are offering the following coupon for 20% off to all LET- and beta users:

**BETA19** (valid until July 31, limited to 50 redemptions)

If you have any questions, just post them here or PM me.

Registration and full details: [BorgBase.com](https://www.borgbase.com/)
